content:
Under Add-On Coverages, the Flight Delay benefit provides $100 for every 3 hours of delay, up to a total of $1,000 for the Basic, Silver, Gold, and Platinium plans.
Under Add-On Coverages, Loss of Frequent Flyer Miles is Covered for the Basic, Silver, Gold, and Platinium plans.
questions: What is the compensation provided for flight delays under the add-on coverages?
How much can one claim for flight delays in the Basic plan?
Is there a maximum limit to the flight delay benefit in the Platinium plan?
Are frequent flyer miles covered under the Basic plan?
What plans include the Loss of Frequent Flyer Miles coverage?
How long does a flight need to be delayed to qualify for the $100 compensation?
Can I receive compensation for a flight delay under the Silver plan?
What is the maximum compensation available for flight delays across all plans?
Are all tiers of plans covered for loss of frequent flyer miles?
How frequently is the $100 disbursed for ongoing flight delays?
